books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The seventh book in the Memory Man series. Decker works with a new partner to investigate a double homicide.
books.name: LONG SHADOWS

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: The eighth book in the John Corey series. When a former lover offers him a job, Corey comes out of forced retirement to track a serial killer.
books.name: THE MAZE

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A high school kid inherits a shed that is a portal to another world where good and evil are at war.
books.name: FAIRY TALE

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.
books.name: UGLY LOVE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult and Jennifer Finney Boylan
books.description: After returning to her hometown, Olivia McAfee’s son gets accused of killing his crush.
books.name: MAD HONEY

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: Musicians from different backgrounds are attracted to each other and a mother flees with her son from an abusive husband.
books.name: DREAMLAND

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Beginning at age 12, Iris Cooper endures a number of hardships in hopes of finding success as a singer.
books.name: THE HIGH NOTES

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 63rd book in the Stone Barrington series. Further adventures begin when a dead man turns up on Stone’s doorstep.
books.name: DISTANT THUNDER

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The 36th book in the Dark/Carpathian series.
books.name: DARK WHISPER

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The 32nd book in the Prey series. Virgil Flowers and Lucas Davenport go after a group of vigilante killers.
books.name: RIGHTEOUS PREY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.
books.name: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: Twelve-year-old Bird Gardner goes on a quest to find his mother, a Chinese American poet whose work he was taught to disavow.
books.name: OUR MISSING HEARTS
